Considering the present state of Indian economy, outline five key agendas for the newly formed Central Government.

The elections was conducted by the elections department in the last few days ago that is in the months of april and May in all over india. Now it is the time for new government formation. Mr. Narendra Modi is the present Prime minister of India. He formed the new government and he selected the few candidates as ministers for various departments. Now indian economy was not good. Modi has to take new policies to grow the economy of the india. 

Most of the indian peoples were choosen Mr. Narendra Modi as the Prime Minister of India. Previously he is the Cheif Minister of Gujarat. He made lot of changes in Gujarat and developed gujarat with his new thouhts and new pollicies. Now a days indian economy was decresing day by day. Recently it was incresed slightly compared to the earlier days.

       India is a developed country. India is developing in the sectors like IT, Pharma and Telecom etc. Previously India was ruled by UPA government. At that time indian economy was very poor there is no growth when they ruled India. Now it is the time for Modi's Government. He is a great leader and he is a well educated person. He has to take certain policies to grow thwe indian economy. 

In India all the resources are available but indians are not utilizing them properly. Now in India corruption is very high. All the politicians are corrupting India. The politicians were bribing too muchly. They not doing thier duties properly. In India politicians are cheating the peoples. They working for their sake of living and not for the country. Now a days In India Black money was incresing day by day and indian economy was decresing day by day.

The newly formed government has to consider the follwing agendas to grow the indian economy. Firstly they has to control the black money. Mr. Modi was appointed a separate team to take about black money.

Second thing they has to consider is law and order. In India the law and order was very good but now there is un countable problems arised in the law and order. The new government has to take new policies to handle the present law and order.

To grow the indian economy there must be good government and good prime minister. The prime Minister is the important person who has to take the Country. The development of the country is depends on the person who ruled it. He is the only person can develop the country by applying the good thoughts and new ideas.

India is a agriculture country. The new government has to consider agriculture to grow the economy of the country. In india most of the people depends on the cultivating. So he has to give support to the formers. To the agriculture the most of the required thing is water. So new government has to construct new projects to supply the water to the form fields. If the water is sufficintly supplied to the formers in time they can get enough profit.

In India new government is formed by the NDA. Now it is time for Modi's new generation. To grow the indian economy he has to consider one more thing that is Education. The country's develpment is depends on the Youth. So the new government he has to improve the Education system.

The new government has to work for the country not for their sake of living. They has to bring new investments from all the other countries to develop all the secotors. Automatically indian economy growth will increse.
